long_description: Use this lightweight nylon footprint under your REI Half Dome 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear. Sized a bit smaller than tent floor to prevent pooling of water between tent and ground sheet during wet weather. Footprint will add 9 - 14 oz. to your pack depending on tent model.
short_description: Use this lightweight nylon footprint under your REI Half Dome 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear.
